title: Drive: Managing a File or a Folder
body:
Drive: Managing a File or a Folder¶

Drive offers organizations a way to collectively store files in a hierarchical organization.
To navigate the filesystem and manage a file or folder, follow the steps below.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Drive

  3. Click My Drive (or Starred Items if you have starred the file by clicking )

  4. If info tab is not displayed, click

  5. If desired, click and to change file/folder display

  6. Click on the appropriate folders (you must click twice to display a folder’s contents) until you have navigated to the desired file

    • Alternatively, search for your file

    • While navigating through the folders, you will be given options for interacting with the folder in the info tab under Details, along with Access , and (if you own the folder or can edit it) an audit trail under Activity

  7. Click the file to show the file Details and interaction options , Access , and (if you own the file or can edit it) an audit trail under Activity

    • Alternatively, click to view interaction options

  8. Click the file again to view the file, details, and comments

    • Click to open the file in a separate tab
